actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $7,500 the amount of outside earnings which (subject to further increases under automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted an individual each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $7,500 the amount of outside earnings which (subject to furthur increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted each year without any deductions from benefits under Title II (Old-Age, Survivor's and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $7,500 the amount of outside earnings which (subject to further increases under automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted an individual each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
